sqlQuery.name: SampleInfo
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT lrt.talon_transcript_name || '_' || ed.name as long_read_transcript_id , jsonkey as sample , jsonvalue as count FROM apidb.longreadtranscript lrt , apidb.get_json_vals(lrt.count_data) , sres.externaldatabaserelease edr , sres.externaldatabase ed WHERE edr.external_database_release_id = lrt.external_database_release_id AND ed.external_database_id = edr.external_database_id
